name: The Raven: Legacy of a Master Thief - Episode 3
name_original: The Raven: Legacy of a Master Thief - Episode 3
description:
The Raven: Legacy of a Master Thief - Episode 3 is an adventure game developed by KING Art. It came out on 24-09-2013. The Adventure Company published the game.
The Raven: Legacy of a Master Thief - Episode 3 is available on PC, Xbox 360 and Classic Macintosh.
